Year
month
Day

He fell asleep at the wheel: in Sole-Ilecca, a driver was convicted of a fatal accident (18+)

Tatarstan's resident was driving with his family to rest on the resort. Two people from his car died.
28 December22:13video videoComments

Residents of the Alexandrov region offered employment for money

A man from the Jaroslava region has transferred 218,000 roubles to the Mahinators, but he has never been employed.
28 December20:13Comments

In Orenburg, pounds of synthetic drugs were found in a clandestine laboratory.

The suspect, a resident of the Primorsky province, also made 11 staircases in the Belaya region.
28 December18:13video videoComments

In the Oktyabr district, a driver was sentenced to five injuries in the accident.

Two of them suffered serious health damage. The court verdict is a fine of 10,000 roubles.
28 December16:42video videoComments

In Orenburg province, there is limited movement due to the methel on the M-5 route.

This is reported to the Regional State Inspectorate.
28 December15:45video videoComments

A teacher from Orenburg wrote a poem about "almost naked" Ivleeva's party.

Tatiana Burashnikov gave him the title " Sodomimites " .
28 December15:13Comments

A GIBD officer from Guy, suspected of receiving a bribe, was placed under house arrest.

The investigation applied for Ivan Shmakov ' s detention
28 December14:32Comments

In Orenburg province, the non-exportable meals and Icru were destroyed

The specialists of the Regional Office of the Russian-Kazakh-Kazakhstan Region of the State border of the Russian Federation, together with the Russian Federation ' s FSB personnel in Orenburg province, the Sagarcin IAP, have halted two attempts to smuggle livestock.
28 December14:15Comments

The aggressive helmet got five years in prison for robbery.

A 35-year-old woman was never tried before.
28 December13:18Comments

Shot in the fence: police from Orenburg fired on the wheels of a stolen car.

An evil man was an 18-year-old guy who didn't even have a driver's license.
28 December11:37video videoComments

Orenburg on the street. A man fell from a multi-stage window (18+)

Traumas are dead. His identity is established.
28 December11:13Comments

Migrant stole gold and money from a resident of Orenburg, and then went to Ufu.

That's where he was detained. Total damages - 430,000 roubles.
28 December10:10video videoComments

In Orenburg province, a soldier killed his brother with two belly blows (18+)

The parent attacked his wife. The victim died in the hospital the day after the incident.
28 December09:57Comments

The Kuwandak woman's ex-wife's nuisance has been put to the public eye.

He is now subject to criminal proceedings.
28 December09:22Comments

A doctor from Orenburg gave 7,000 roubles to fraudsters.

There's a criminal case, the villains are wanted, but it's gonna be hard to do. And returning credit will have to be a trusted woman.
28 December09:08Comments

Missing the stuff? In the LNG case, which stole oil in Orenburg province, a new turn

One of the participants in the criminal group to which the ex-President of the Orenburg Federation of the IMA, Victor Frolov, has been involved has applied to the UK of the Orenburg Region to initiate a new criminal case. According to him, 28.5 tons of oil, which were material proof, had been handed over to responsible storage, had simply been pumped along the line, and another eight tons of oil had not been delivered at all before the oil production had been installed.
28 December07:13Comments

In Ponomarevok, a 32-year-old man beat a 66-year-old pensioner to death due to jealousy (18+)

The deceased was 66 years old. The defendant has heard the verdict.
27 December22:13Comments

Damage of 5 million roubles: CNG members who were stealing on a new venture did not commute the sentence

The Criminal Division of the Orenburg Regional Court adjudicated, on appeal, criminal proceedings against employees of the enterprise who attempted to steal property by an ad hoc group.
27 December18:13Comments

In Orenburg province, 4 million roubles were prevented from smuggling pork

According to Samara Customs, 19 tons of meat were traced from Russia to Kazakhstan.
27 December15:45Comments

In Buguruslan, an engineer is suspected of taking bribes for undervaluing the energy consumption.

The leading engineer of the electricity supply facility is detained.
27 December12:22Comments

...further,

Cases

This section orenday is devotedAccidents, Tragedies, Disasters and Crimesrelevantin Orenburgand Orenburg.
We're following the accident reports and we're telling you the most.Importantand relevant ones.

Avia and car crashes, accidents

Transport events unfortunately occur in large quantitiesevery day♪ Orenday does not report a number of situations, such as " bats " on the road. Our task is to inform readers promptly of the events that need to be known.

11 FebruaryA plane collapsed in PodmoskovjeSaratov airlines with orchards on board. It was the Moskva Orsk flight.71 passengersand crew members are dead.

Landing accidentUrban Districttook seven lives.♪ 18-year-old Camille Kuvatov, like saving a guardian angel, losing her parents, she became a guardian of a younger sister.

Large scale

“Snow prisoners”In 2016, due to heavy metal in the snowOrenburg-OrskThere are dozens of cars. People who freeze in their cars waited more than 15 hours.

Crimes and penalties

We're tracking information on crimes and telling people who and for what he's done or he's gonna be punished, be it.gangs or killersof commissionedthe killing of entrepreneursin Orenburg

Of course, it's impossible to keep quiet about when the Ringers becomeGlobalMMM -Family Copier CooperativeI left hundreds of people without blood. By investing money on interest, many have copied for surgery, housing and other important needs.

Officials often have problems with the law. For example,criminal proceedingsnow former head of OrenburgEugenia ArapovaconvictedHead of Gennady Borisov♪TrialsThe Ministry of Education, the Ministry of Labour and Employment of the Orenburg Region, the Ministry of Agriculture of the Region, addressed them.

Search operations

We don't stay indifferent if the security forces or volunteers ask for help and help from the bandwidths.searching for people♪ Stillnot establishedlocationA serial maniac from Orsca Valeria Andreeva♪

Stay on all the news with me.Orenday♪

Use of materials

All rights to be published on orenday are protected under the law of the Russian Federation. Any use of materials is permitted only in agreement with the Editor, with a mandatory active reference to the source.

The editorial is not responsible for the validity of advertisements posted on the website orenday.ru, the website content of the hyperlinks and the comments. Comments to the publications are personal views of the website users.
